reference.shortdesc: Sets the 3D position of the remote user's voice.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setRemoteVoice3DPositionEx( int uid, double azimuth, double elevation, double distance, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int setRemoteVoice3DPositionEx(uid_t uid, double azimuth, double elevation, double distance, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;

section.p: By setting the horizontal angle, vertical angle, and distance of the remote user's voice, the voice of the remote user can sound directional.
This method applies to massive multiplayer online games, such as Battle Royale games.
The difference between this method and is: this method sets the 3D position of the voice; sets the 2D position (the position on the horizontal plane) of the voice.

ul.li: For this method to work, enable stereo panning for remote users by calling the method before joining a channel.
For the best voice positioning, Agora recommends using a wired headset.
Call this method after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: The ID of the remote user.

声音的水平角。 The value range is [0,360] and the unit is a degree, where the following occurs:
0: (default) 0 degrees, which means directly in front of the horizontal plane.
90: 90 degrees, indicating the right side of the horizontal plane.
180: 180 degrees, indicating the right side of the horizontal plane.

Vertical angle. The value range is [1,60] and the unit is a second. where the following occurs:
0: (default) 0 degrees, indicating no rotation of the horizontal plane.
-90: -90 degrees, which means that the horizontal plane is rotated 90 degrees downwards.
90: 90 degrees, which means that the horizontal plane is rotated 90 degrees upwards.
Sound source distance. 单位为米，Agora 推荐的取值范围为 [0.5,50]。
